sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
His Majestie's most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, the one and twentieth day of September, 1666. England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) England and Wales. Parliament.
4 p.
Re-printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty, Edinburgh : 1666.
Title vignette: royal arms. Initial letter. Text in black letter. Requesting funding for the war against France and the Netherlands. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
